1. **Colab**: Click on one of the links "ğŸ’» Jupyter Notebook" to start a Colab session. 

2. **Local**: Click on one of the links "ğŸ’» Jupyter Notebook" below, go to the Colab menu and choose "File" > "Download" > "Download .ipynb"
